vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.9;
son of: Shaharaim (H7842) and Hodesh (H2321);
brother of: Jobab (H3103J), Zibia (H6644), Malcam (H4445A), Jeuz (H3263), Sachia (H7634), Mirmah (H4821), Abitub (H0036) and Elpaal (H0508)
§ Mesha = "freedom"
a Benjamite, son of Shaharaim by his wife Hodesh who bore him in the land of Moab
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Saharaim; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米沙 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "自由"
一位便雅憫人, 沙哈連和他的妻子賀得在摩押地所生 (代上8:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米沙 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "自由"
一位便雅悯人, 沙哈连和他的妻子贺得在摩押地所生 (代上8:9)
